mapper.select: select * from marketuser order by us_num
mapper.insert: insert into marketuser(us_num, us_id, us_pass, us_name, us_nickname, us_birth, us_email, us_gender, us_address1, us_address2, us_phone) values((select nvl(max(us_num), 0)+1 from marketuser),#{us_id},#{us_pass},#{us_name},#{us_nickname},#{us_birth},#{us_email},#{us_gender}, #{us_address1},#{us_address2},#{us_phone})
mapper.update: update marketuser set us_id = #{us_id}, us_pass = #{us_pass}, us_name = #{us_name}, us_birth = #{us_birth}, us_gender = #{us_gender}, us_email = #{us_email}, us_address1 = #{us_address1}, us_address2 = #{us_address2}, us_phone = #{us_phone} where us_num = #{us_num}
